name: Arquivo Historico da Cidade de Barcelona

reviews.text: Do not miss this free to access building, just around the corner of the Cathedral. Great terrace and open space.

We had no idea when we entered this museum that we would see the history of Barcelona beginning in Roman times.  There was a complete underground excavation of the Roman city that became Barcelona.  The history continued through the many eras in the city's history including the transition to Christianity and the construction of the current cathedral on the ruins of thr Roman city.
